item.title: The "Where Did I Park?" Panic: A Deep Dive into Parking Lot Frustration
item.description: That sinking feeling in your stomach. The frantic scan of rows and rows of cars. The creeping dread as you realize you have absolutely no idea where you parked. We’ve all been there, haven’t we? The “Where did I park?” panic is a universal experience, a frustrating blend of confusion, anxiety, and wasted time. But why is it such a common phenomenon, and what can we do to overcome this modern-day dilemma?
